definitions.title: n.f.pl.
definitions.body: generations, esp. in genealogies = account of a man and his descendants;—cstr. [[תּוֹלְדוֹת]] Ge 2:4, Ru 4:18; [[תּוֹלְדׂת]] Ge 5:1 + 6 t.; [[תּׂלְדוֹת]] Ge 36:1 + 2 t.; [[תּׂלְדׂת]] Ge 25:12; sf. [[תּׂלְדׂתָיו]] 1Ch 26:31; [[תּוֹלְדׂתָם]] Ex 28:10 + 16 t.; [[תּׂלְדוֹתָם]] 1Ch 5:7 + 5 t.; [[תּׂלְדׂתָם]] Ex 6:16, Ex 6:19; —

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: account of men and their descendants Ge 5:1, Ge 6:9, Ge 10:1, Ge 11:10, Ge 11:27, Ge 25:12, Ge 25:19, Ge 36:1, Ge 36:9, Ge 37:2, Nu 3:1, Ru 4:18, 1Ch 1:29; successive generations (in) of families ([[מִשְׁפָּחׂת]]) Ge 10:32 cf. Ge 25:13, Ex 6:16, Ex 6:19, Ex 28:10; genealogical divisions, by parentage Nu 1:20 ([[לְמִשְׁפְּחׂתָם]] ´[[ת]]) + 11 t. Nu 1; [[וְאֶחָיו לְמִשְׁפְּחׂתָיו בְּהִתְיִחֶשׂ לתולדוֹתם]] 1Ch 5:7 cf. 1Ch 7:9 and prob. also 1Ch 7:2 v. Be, 1Ch 7:4, 1Ch 8:28, 1Ch 9:9, 1Ch 9:34, 1Ch 26:31.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: metaph. [[תּוֹלְדוֹת הַשָּׁמַיִם וְהָאָרֶץ]] Ge 2:4 lit. begettings of heaven and earth, i.e. account of heaven and earth and that which proceeded from them (cf. Dr:Intr. 5 n.) In Hex always P.
